name: Mona
tagline: Functional programming with a focus on speed, safety, and control
body:
Mona is a functional programming language with a focus on speed, safety, and control. The language is still in very early development.

I'm blogging about the language here: [jancorazza.com/tag/mona/](http://jancorazza.com/tag/mona/)

Page under construction

# Features

- Pattern matching
- Type inference
- Algebraic types
- Type classes
- Haskell-inspired syntax
- Unique reference semantics
- Ownership and borrowing

# Logo

![Mona Logo](http://res.cloudinary.com/dhngozzmz/image/upload/v1452513700/mona-logo_r7o5lb.png)

This is just mock up idea of the logo
